title: Makes provisions regarding pesticide applicator certification
summary: Provides that provisions relating to registration and certification of pesticide applicators shall not apply to any person who formulates, re-packages, or distributes restricted use pesticides and does not engage in the commercial or private application of such pesticides.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2777

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 20, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of A. CROUCH, FINCH -- read once and referred to the
         Committee on Environmental Conservation

       AN ACT to amend the  environmental  conservation  law,  in  relation  to
         applicability of provisions relating to registration and certification
         of pesticide application

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 1  of  section  33-0905  of  the  environmental
    2  conservation  law,  as  amended  by  chapter 612 of the laws of 1983, is
    3  amended to read as follows:
    4    1. Any person who engages in the commercial or private application  of
    5  pesticides  or  the sale of restricted use pesticides shall be certified
    6  by the commissioner except ANY PERSON  WHO  FORMULATES,  REPACKAGES,  OR
    7  DISTRIBUTES RESTRICTED USE PESTICIDES AND DOES NOT ENGAGE IN THE COMMER-
    8  CIAL OR PRIVATE APPLICATION OF SUCH PESTICIDES AND EXCEPT as provided in
    9  subdivision  two of this section. No certification shall be valid unless
   10  the certified person also holds a valid identification  card  issued  by
   11  the commissioner.
   12    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD04538-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to applicability of provisions relating to registration and certification of pesticide application
